document.heading: District of Columbia Real Property Tax Reclassification Amendment Act of 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-160, the “District of Columbia Real Property Tax Reclassification Amendment Act of 1990,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-537, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 29, 1990, and June 12, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 29, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-223 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 8-160 became effective on September 30, 1990.
